about_the_game:
Car Service Simulator combines realistic car repair, customization, business management, and open-world exploration. Run your own auto service center, repair and modify cars, and grow your business while exploring a dynamic world. Master car maintenance, impress customers, and dominate the industry!

🔧 Main Features:

Become a Master Car Repair and Maintenance

Diagnose and fix engines, brakes, suspensions, and transmissions using advanced tools. Replace worn-out parts, rebuild engines, and handle complex repairs. Upgrade your skills to take on bigger challenges and become the go-to expert in the auto industry.

Customize and Upgrade Cars for Maximum Performance

Use a professional paint booth to create stunning designs. Modify vehicles with body kits, performance parts, and custom wraps. Improve speed, handling, and aesthetics to meet customer demands and build a reputation for top-quality work.

Manage and Expand Your Auto Service Business

Negotiate with customers, set competitive prices, and invest in better equipment. Buy, sell, and trade parts to maximize profits. A well-managed business means more customers, higher earnings, and a thriving workshop.

Professional Wash:

Deep clean vehicles using your washing machine. Make vehicles shine like the first day by using cleaning materials and water effectively. Improve your washing skills and equipment.

Strategic Business Management:

Use an effective negotiation system to increase customer satisfaction. Listen to customers' complaints, negotiate deals with them and maximize your profits. Make strategic decisions to grow your business and achieve success.

Explore an Open World Full of Opportunities

Visit the junkyard to find rare parts, explore the marketplace for deals, or order premium components online. Grow your empire in a fully interactive open-world environment.

Build your own car service empire, master car maintenance and maximize customer satisfaction with Car Service Simulator..Customize, repair, wash, and manage your dream garage. Add to your wishlist now!
